## Install

To run the scripts in the terminal, give `chmod` permissions, if the script needs:
```sh
chmod +x [name]
```
Move to `/usr/bin/` or `/usr/local/bin/` now:
```sh
sudo mv -v [name] /usr/bin/
#sudo mv -v [name] /usr/local/bin/
```
